Class MovieDAO

java.lang.Object
com.group18.dao.MovieDAO
public class MovieDAO extends Object
This class provides CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for managing movies in the database. It interacts with the 'movies' table in the database to perform operations like adding, updating, removing, and fetching movie details.

  • Method Details

    • findById

      public Movie findById(int movieId)
      Finds a movie by its unique identifier (movieId).
      Parameters:
      movieId - The unique identifier of the movie.
      Returns:
      The Movie object corresponding to the provided movieId, or null if no such movie exists.

    • addMovie

      public boolean addMovie(Movie movie)
      Adds a new movie to the database.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object containing the details of the movie to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the movie was successfully added; false otherwise.

    • updateMovie

      public boolean updateMovie(Movie movie)
      Updates an existing movie in the database.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object containing the updated details of the movie.
      Returns:
      True if the movie was successfully updated; false otherwise.

    • getAllMovies

      public List<Movie> getAllMovies()
      Retrieves all movies from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all movies in the database.

    • extractMovieFromResultSet

      private Movie extractMovieFromResultSet(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Extracts a Movie object from the result set.
      Parameters:
      rs - The ResultSet object containing the movie data.
      Returns:
      A Movie object populated with data from the result set.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while extracting data from the result set.

    • removeMovie

      public boolean removeMovie(int movieId)
      Removes a movie from the database by its unique identifier (movieId), only if the movie is not associated with any schedules.
      Parameters:
      movieId - The unique identifier of the movie to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the movie was successfully removed; false otherwise.

    • findMovieByScheduleId

      public Movie findMovieByScheduleId(int scheduleId)
      Finds a movie based on its associated schedule ID.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - The unique identifier of the schedule.
      Returns:
      The Movie object associated with the given schedule ID, or null if no such movie exists.
